dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename! Come to admire the fruits of your labor, eh?

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: I reckon you'll be singin' a song in your heart when you see what this place has become, all through the efforts of you and your fellow skybuilders. Go on─take it all in.

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: As Francel doubtless told you, Risensong's to be the new center of culture and aesthetic appreciation here in the Firmament.

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: It's a place where nobles and commonfolk alike can now partake in the finer pleasures of life, like a soothing dip in the waters at Snowsoak Springs. We also have a brand-new infirmary, where those sufferin' from all manner of injuries and ailments can get the care they need.

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: Now, typically this would be where I tell you to not to wander off, what with our next buildin' project awaitin' on the agenda. But─and I can scarce believe I'm sayin' this─our work here has finally come to an end.

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: Aye, you heard me right. The rebirth of the Risensong Quarter marks the culmination of the restoration project in its entirety. I'm sure you'll agree that we've wrought somethin' wonderful here. Truly, I can't thank you enough for lendin' your skills and labor to the cause.

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: Hm? What are you all standin' about for? Isn't there work what needs doin' somewhere?

dialogue.name: ENIE
dialogue.text: Oh, come now, Augebert. Who gave you a monopoly on the company of our favorite skybuilder? We simply wished to express our gratitude as well.

dialogue.name: POTKIN
dialogue.text: Though the reconstruction effort itself may be complete, we hope that you'll grace us with your presence from time to time. After all, we will still have need of various and sundry materials for maintenance and upkeep. Pray don't be a stranger!

dialogue.name: LIZBETH
dialogue.text: Indeed. Should you be so inclined, the Kupo of Fortune will always be here to smile upon you, my friend.

dialogue.name: LUDOVRAINT
dialogue.text: And should you deign to assist us from time to time, it will be my pleasure and honor both to continue to keep a record of your many accomplishments, that they might be remembered by all who would follow you.

dialogue.name: FLOTPASSANT
dialogue.text: Truly, we have nothing but gratitude for you and your fellow artisans. What once the people of this nation could never have dreamed, you have made a reality!

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: But what are we standin' about here for? I don't know about the rest of you, but I'm in the mood for celebratin'─an' lookin' at the faces of the people around us, I'm far from the only one.

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: Meanwhile, I reckon Francel's just itchin' to share his thoughts with you, Forename. If you've got a moment to spare, why not pay him a call? Till we meet again!
